name: Block Pusher (Clorica6)
description:
A classic top-down block pushing puzzle game! Can you complete all 5 puzzles?

Playtime: <5min

No sound.

Afterthoughts

I had a lot of fun designing these block puzzles!  Unfortunately, Unity does not natively serialize 2D arrays, so I wasn't able to design levels as easily as I wanted. That's why to save time, there are only 5 simple levels.

The last level requires a lot of keypresses, which is tedious. I should have definitely added a delayed keyrepeater. I'm also seeing a lot of other spots I can polish/improve on, so I may revisit this project one day.

But for now, onto the next game!
